sentences.en: After enduring the hardship of the arduous fieldwork , the prospecting team discovered many new ores.
sentences.cn: 地质勘探队员餐风饮露,历尽辛苦, 找到了不少新的矿藏.

sentences.en: an arduous journey across the Andes
sentences.cn: 翻越安第斯山脉的艰苦之行

sentences.en: Despite very severe weather, the arduous search was maintained for seven days.
sentences.cn: 虽然气候十分凛冽, 这种辛苦的搜索,持续了七天之久.

sentences.en: He made an arduous effort to keep up with the rest of the class.
sentences.cn: 他努力跟上班上其他同学.

sentences.en: Her delicate constitution disinclined her from such an arduous job.
sentences.cn: 她纤弱的体质使得她不欲担任如此艰巨的工作.

sentences.en: I regard Beethoven as a genius who exerted arduous efforts.
sentences.cn: 我认为贝多芬是一位勤奋努力的天才.

sentences.en: It must have been a very arduous task to build the pyramids.
sentences.cn: 当时建造金字塔肯定是件万分艰巨的事.

sentences.en: Nim settled himself in the witness chair, aware that his presentation would be long and arduous.
sentences.cn: 尼姆在证人席上坐定, 意识到他的陈述将是又长又费劲的.

sentences.en: Take your ease, for the journey ahead will be long and arduous.
sentences.cn: 好好休息一下, 前面的路程远而艰难呢.

sentences.en: The impressions with which I first understood the arduous trust were explained on the proper occasion.
sentences.cn: 关于我最初负起这个艰巨职责的感想,我已经在适当的场合说过了.

sentences.en: The lawful punishment and reform of criminals remains an arduous task in China.
sentences.cn: 依照法律惩罚和改造罪犯,在中国仍然是一项艰巨的工作.

sentences.en: There was nothing especially arduous in this round of religious obligations.
sentences.cn: 履行这一类宗教义务并无艰辛之处.

sentences.en: Those who seek it, undertake an arduous journey and can never be sure that they will find it.
sentences.cn: 寻求正义的人历尽艰辛,也决不能肯定他们就能找到正义.

sentences.en: We must have patience in doing arduous work.
sentences.cn: 我们做艰苦的工作要有耐性.

sentences.en: We must persevere in the arduous work.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要坚持这项艰苦的工作.

trans.tran_cn: 努力的，艰巨的，难克服的，陡峭的
trans.tran_en: involving a lot of strength and effort
